revised_title: David Victor Glass: A Pioneering Social and Population Scientist
tldr: David Victor Glass was a prominent social and population scientist who made significant contributions to the fields of demography, sociology, and urban studies. His work focused on understanding the factors influencing population distribution and change, including marriage, employment, and socio-economic factors. Glass played a crucial role in the establishment of the Population Investigation Committee and was a pioneer in the study of social mobility and its impact on individuals and society.
